title: Reinstalling windows xp on HP tablet TC 1100

forumNotes.author: nguyenxh
forumNotes.content:
Hi,  

Recently I have installed windows 7 on my HP tablet pc tc 1100. I think it is a little slow so I want to reinstall windows xp on my HP tablet pc tc 1100.  

But there is no cd drive in my pc, so the only chance that I can get it back is using booting from usb like what I did to install windows 7 before. But now, I created a usb hiren boot, tested with other PC, it works during booting. But for my HP, it does not work. Off course, I am sure to choose booting with usb is the first priority.   

So, could you give me an advice on how to reinstall my windows xp on my hp tc 1100? I dont have an external cd drive.   

Thanks in advance

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
Several methods here:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...ndows-f157.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/install-windows-f157.html "External link")  

This one is recommended:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...sb-t120444.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/install-winsetupfromusb-t120444.html "External link")  
as it uses RMPREPUSB to partition/format the stick, which should result in higher probabilities of it booting.  

![:dubbio:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/dubbio.gif)  
Wonko
